rules_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may exile the top card of your library. If you do, until end of turn, you can’t play cards from your hand and you may play the exiled card.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pure Imagination: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Pure Imagination, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant card and a sorcery card. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
notes:
Changed names, added art, added flavor text
Front 0/0 —> 2/3
Reworked front
+Legendary backside
